title: kblacke's Author Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:y2k]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
 
[[=]]
**About me**
[[/=]]
> Hello! My name is kblacke, and I'm an author (in the loosest sense) here on the SCP Wiki.
> [[=]]
> Strive to do what makes you happy, and inspire others, that's how you find success. 
> [[/=]]
> P.S. I love to crit works, so don't feel afraid to send me a PM if you need any feedback on anything :) 
@@ @@
[[div class="blockquote"]]

= [[size 200%]]**SCP ##pink|ARTICLES##**[[/size]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[=]]
--[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7352 SCP-7352 - Mother Butterfly]-- Currently Under Re-write
[[/=]]

[[=]]
 //A story with a hideous beauty behind it, a woman who wants nothing more than to protect her children.//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@
[[=]]
= [[size 200%]]**##lightblue|TALES##**[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-bookworm The Bookworm]
[[/=]]
 
[[=]]
//A story about the termination of a girl named Tohko Aikawa, featuring the GOC, and Serpent's Hand.//
[[/=]]
 
[[=]]
 [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/it-s-pouring It's pouring]
[[/=]]
 
[[=]]
 //A prose poem based on [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3300 SCP-3300, The Rain] by [[*user rumetzen]]//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
= [[size 200%]]**##white|TRANSLATED## WORKS**[[/size]]
[[/=]]
Thank you and anyone who takes the time to look at or translate my works! I feel honored you'd take the time to! 
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[http://scp-vn.wikidot.com/it-s-pouring It's pouring - VIET Translation] //by// [[*user Dept]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
= [[size 200%]]**WILL**[[/size]]
[[/=]]
> In the event of me disappearing off of the main site or the Official SCP Discord, for around one year as of 5/7/2024, all of my works are to be passed on to [[*user Nonacherontia]]
[[/div]]

 _
